Title: Override Removes Supported Interface
Content:
The `Module` contract [overrides the `supportsInterface` function](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/blob/12a9eb1afb18a7f7cb43d774cabb2d5af7c74e6b/packages/world/src/Module.sol#L19) and no longer supports the [`WORLD_CONTEXT_CONSUMER_INTERFACE_ID`](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/blob/12a9eb1afb18a7f7cb43d774cabb2d5af7c74e6b/packages/world/src/WorldContext.sol#L53). This is inconsistent with the [equivalent `DelegationControl` override](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/blob/12a9eb1afb18a7f7cb43d774cabb2d5af7c74e6b/packages/world/src/DelegationControl.sol#L21), which retains support for the `WORLD_CONTEXT_CONSUMER_INTERFACE_ID`.


Consider ensuring ERC-165 support for all implemented interfaces.


***Update:** Resolved in [pull request #2032](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/pull/2032#pullrequestreview-1800335464).*
